Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Democrats did not vote against the Social Security cost-of-living increase.
Understate: The claim understates the fact that lawmakers did not vote on the increase.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on misinformation circulating on social media.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that Democrats voted against the increase without any evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the increase is determined by economic calculations and not by lawmakers.
